{ "displayorder": 2, "pagetemplateid": "5e619c24-7822-ee11-9cbd-000d3a1c0c13", "parentpageid": "841a0d1d-c991-b2b2-c1bc-f92c07bda41c", "partialurl": "Batch-Upload", "isroot": false, "rootwebpageid": "1406df6d-4a52-fd3f-b27d-48273cc1d8df", "title": "Batch Upload", "summary": "

This is a sample landing page designed to be a starting point for your website

", "copy": "
\n
\n
\n
\n

Resource Requests – Batch Upload Process

\n

​Enter a title for your batch upload and select 'Yes' for the Batch upload option.

Ensure that you save the file in a CSV (comma separated values) format. Please use the template provided here to download file formatting requirements and a template. Before uploading the attachment, strip all commas in the file by doing a 'find/replace' operation.

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
{% webform name: 'Batch Upload Requests New' %}
\n

powerpagecomponent.name: Batch Upload
